701391f-a.title: Bronx: Lafayette Avenue - Metcalf Avenue
701391f-a.text:
Lafayette Ave. (foreground, not seen), south side, between Metcalf and Fteley Aves., showing farm land on the former estate of E. H. Ludlow (Bromley map of 1913). The low brick homes in the background
face on Rosedale Ave.
JJuly 30, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701391f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Metcalf Avenue, Bronx, NY

701392f-a.title: Bronx: Lafayette Avenue - Metcalf Avenue
701392f-a.text:
Lafayette Ave. (foreground, not seen), adjoining the N.E. corner of Metcalf Ave., showing a farm house occupying that site on the former estate
of E. H. Ldlow (Bromley map of 1913).
July 30, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701392f-a.folder: Lafayette Avenue & Metcalf Avenue, Bronx, NY

701454f-a.title: Bronx: Metcalf Avenue - Lafayette Avenue
701454f-a.text:
Metcalf Ave. (foreground, not seen), west side, between Lafayette and Seward Aves. The view is in a southwesterly direction showing a cultivated field. In the background is visible the coke plant of the
Consolidated Edison Company.
July 30, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.
701454f-a.folder: Metcalf Avenue & Lafayette Avenue, Bronx, NY
